steps.title: Draw an oval for his head.Then, underneath the oval, draw a diagonal line.
steps.content: Draw an oval for his head.Then, underneath the oval, draw a diagonal line. The diagonal line will give you a picture of how the shoulders will look.

steps.title: Draw a cross on the oval.
steps.content: Draw a cross on the oval. This will help you draw the face in symmetrically and it will also help you have an easier time with the facial features. Then, add a vertical guideline at the bottom of the image and add a line on either side of the head to help you draw his hair.

steps.title: Draw two lines to help shape the torso.
steps.content: Draw two lines to help shape the torso. Add half circles for eyes and begin to add definition to the chin.

steps.title: Add detail to the eyes and begin to shape the nose.
steps.content: Add detail to the eyes and begin to shape the nose. Draw more lines to mark his hair.

steps.title: Add eyebrows and a mouth and begin filling in his hair.
steps.content: Add eyebrows and a mouth and begin filling in his hair. After you are done filling in his ear, add the buttons to his shirt.

steps.title: Erase the guidelines.
steps.content: Erase the guidelines. The guidelines are only for posing Benjamin Franklin's position and if you leave it on, you will have pencil marks after your finished project,

steps.title: Colour the drawing.
steps.content: Colour the drawing. While colouring the drawing, be sure to add highlights and shades to make him appear more realistic!
